actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from OMB; Health and Human Services Department.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Handicapped - SSHR.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to provide for comprehensive study of the rehabilitation needs of the Pacific Basin, emphasizing the need for trained rehabilitation personnel, and for  other purposes.
short_title: Pacific Basin Rehabilitation Needs Study Act
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Pacific Basin Rehabilitation Needs Study Act - Amends the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to direct the Department of Education's National Institute for Handicapped Research to conduct a study of the mental and physical rehabilitation needs of the Pacific Basin. Requires a report to Congress within one year of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Pacific Basin Rehabilitation Needs Study Act

A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to provide for comprehensive study of the rehabilitation needs of the Pacific Basin, emphasizing the need for trained rehabilitation personnel, and for  other purposes.
